channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped items, 15th January
item.description:
Mattress and Xmas trees dumped on Sigdon passage

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sigdon Passage, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Obsolete vehicle parked on residential street, 15th January
item.description:
Lorry has been parked for over a year in this position. Absolutely needs removing. Paring in this street is free and residents struggle because people drive in from out of London to then commute from here on a bus. Spaces are always taken and this lorry takes 3! Seperately - this area should be made residential parking only.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Stratheden Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose and uneven paving slabs with water underneath, 15th January
item.description:
Around 4 paving slabs have become loose and uneven, probably due to instability of the substrate. When you tread on one of them it moves significantly, and when wet, ejects water. The surface is unsafe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Imperial Way, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped car, 15th January

item.title: Car parked across the pavement, 15th January
item.description:

item.title: Human Waste - Vomit, 15th January
item.description:
There is vomit on the pavement outside of 48 Albert Road. Please clean this as soon as possible. This is a busy street that children and people walking their dogs regularly use. It is unsanitary, unhygienic and unsightly. Please respond promptly. Jet wash required.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Upper Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
